email1.contents:
Dear Victoria,
	I hope all is well. I discovered this address when cleaning out our room. It was wedged in the back corner, where you used to hide your illicit materials. I threw out what was left under there.
	I put your old gameboy in the giveaway pile. Your sketchbook I plan to keep.
	Please let me know if there is anything else you would like me to hold on to.
	Sincerely,
	“Duckie”

email3.to:
Dear Victoria,
I will take that image as meaning you do not care about any of your old belongings and will donate them/trash them as their condition dictates.
How have you been? What are you doing now?
Kindly,
Duckie
